content: I opened codespace of mathlib4, but infoview does not work.

It works fine for me, though it does take a while for the server to start properly. Do you have further information to help debug? (are you running the codespace via vscode, are any errors reported in the output panels anywhere?)
I waited longer (3 ~ 5 minutes ) and it was done! Thank you very much.
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
gitpod is another option that is already set up to work with mathlib that in my experience loads faster (which is sort of the point of these cloud development services after all!)
